verses.verse: And he shewed <WH7200> me Joshua <WH3091> the high <WH1419> priest <WH3548> standing <WH5975> before <WH6440> the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068>, and Satan <WH7854> standing <WH5975> at his right hand <WH3225> to resist <WH7853> him.

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Satan <WH7854>, The LORD <WH3068> rebuke <WH1605> thee, O Satan <WH7854>; even the LORD <WH3068> that hath chosen <WH977> Jerusalem <WH3389> rebuke <WH1605> thee: is not this a brand <WH181> plucked <WH5337> out of the fire <WH784>?
Now Joshua <WH3091> was clothed <WH3847> with filthy <WH6674> garments <WH899>, and stood <WH5975> before <WH6440> the angel <WH4397>.

And he answered <WH6030> and spake <WH559> unto those that stood <WH5975> before <WH6440> him, saying <WH559>, Take away <WH5493> the filthy <WH6674> garments <WH899> from him. And unto him he said <WH559>, Behold <WH7200>, I have caused thine iniquity <WH5771> to pass <WH5674> from thee, and I will clothe <WH3847> thee with change of raiment <WH4254>.

And I said <WH559>, Let them set <WH7760> a fair <WH2889> mitre <WH6797> upon his head <WH7218>. So they set <WH7760> a fair <WH2889> mitre <WH6797> upon his head <WH7218>, and clothed <WH3847> him with garments <WH899>. And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> stood by <WH5975>.
And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> protested <WH5749> unto Joshua <WH3091>, saying <WH559>,

Thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>; If thou wilt walk <WH3212> in my ways <WH1870>, and if thou wilt keep <WH8104> my charge <WH4931>, then thou shalt also judge <WH1777> my house <WH1004>, and shalt also keep <WH8104> my courts <WH2691>, and I will give <WH5414> thee places to walk <WH4108> among these that stand by <WH5975>.

Hear <WH8085> now, O Joshua <WH3091> the high <WH1419> priest <WH3548>, thou, and thy fellows <WH7453> that sit <WH3427> before <WH6440> thee: for they are men <WH582> wondered at <WH4159>: for, behold, I will bring forth <WH935> my servant <WH5650> the BRANCH <WH6780>.

For behold the stone <WH68> that I have laid <WH5414> before <WH6440> Joshua <WH3091>; upon one <WH259> stone <WH68> shall be seven <WH7651> eyes <WH5869>: behold, I will engrave <WH6605> the graving <WH6603> thereof, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, and I will remove <WH4185> the iniquity <WH5771> of that land <WH776> in one <WH259> day <WH3117>.
In that day <WH3117>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, shall ye call <WH7121> every man <WH376> his neighbour <WH7453> under the vine <WH1612> and under the fig tree <WH8384>.
